experience.title: Data Product Manager - Delivery Experience
experience.description: Crafted and executed a vision to build a speed loss attribution tool that enhanced our speed delivery program in Australia, Mexico, Singapore and Brazil. I closely collaborated with data engineering, finance, and CX product teams. By leveraging advanced analytics and thinking backward from the customer's POV, I ensured our platform delivered optimal selection and speed, contributing significantly to Amazon‚Äôs market leadership in rapid delivery solutions.

experience.title: Data Product Manager
experience.description: Led the development of a comprehensive big data analytics product focused on patient journey analysis. This tool was instrumental in generating actionable insights for marketing and sales strategies, enabling directors to effectively evaluate market dynamics, track drug performance, and understand patient transitions. My leadership in this project supported the successful launch of two novel immunology drugs, contributing to a portfolio value of $18 billion. This platform provided critical data on market share, sources of business, and patient migration patterns, thereby driving informed decision-making and significant market growth.
experience.description_html: Led the development of a comprehensive big data analytics product focused on patient journey analysis. This tool was instrumental in generating actionable insights for marketing and sales strategies, enabling directors to effectively evaluate market dynamics, track drug performance, and understand patient transitions. My leadership in this project supported the successful launch of two novel immunology drugs, contributing to a portfolio value of $18 billion. This platform provided critical data on market share, sources of business, and patient migration patterns, thereby driving informed decision-making and significant market growth.

recommendations: Michael Vula ‚ÄúJahnavi is a great collaborator and strategic problem solver. I had the pleasure of working with Jahnavi at ZS Associates on several projects and workstreams that I oversaw. She is a hard worker, with strong attention to detail, and thorough follow-through. Additionally, she has the ability to act swiftly, utilizing a data-backed approach while considering the qualitative side of the problem at hand. Jahnavi was also successful in developing impactful relationships with clients by consistently providing them with actionable insights and solutions. Jahnavi would be an asset to any organization. ‚Äù

Pratik Mane ‚ÄúWe meet many people but only some leave the marks, and one of them is Jahnavi. A senior every newbie would want as a guide and mentor, she is a determined person who always tries to find the solution in the smartest way. Her technical proficiency stands out when she couples it with her wise decisions, and I ensure that she will be a valuable asset to any company. As a junior, she earns my highest recommendation.‚Äù
